Airbomber: How'd he do that? I've never been able to shut myself down so in=
stantly like that. Damn the world to hell.

Airbomber kept his eyes on the =
entrance of the cave, wondering if maybe Infectra would find them...

ound. They were four:: 
  Cyclonus: We can manage, yes. 
  ::He pauses for =
a second, but his thoughts are cut short by hearing Angel 
  Prime's shouti=
ng:: 
  Cyclonus: Damn! Kill him! 
  ::Cyclonus flies toward Angel Prime fi=
res 4 high powered laser blasts at him:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Scourge fires 25 rap=
id laser blasts at Angel Prime:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::My Destrons were watching Cy=
gnar. Ramjet could not beleive his eyes. the 
  base was gone:: 
  Ramjet: =
You are not the last Destrons. I am Ramjet, leader of the Destrocons. 
  Th=
ese are my team members: Dirge, Skywarp, Falcon, and Snare. We have been 
 =
 loyal Destrons for a long time. What has happened here? 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Time=
 Warp walked into the cave, curled up into one corner, and fell asleep::
